data.blankContent: Written with the Latin script, Estonian is the language of the Estonian people and the official language of the country. One-third ____ the ____ vocabulary ____ derived ____ adding ____ to ____ words. The ____ known ____ of ____ Estonian ____ in 13th century ____. During the Soviet era, the Russian language was imposed in parallel to, and often instead of, Estonian in official use.

During the Soviet era, the Russian language was imposed in parallel to, and often instead of, Estonian in official use.
data.answer: 爱沙尼亚语用拉丁文字书写，是爱沙尼亚人民的语言，也是国家的官方语言。三分之一的标准词汇来源于词根加上后缀。已知的最古老的爱沙尼亚文字记录起源于13世纪的编年史。在苏联时期，官方使用俄语时，俄语通常与爱沙尼亚语并行不市，而不是爱沙尼亚语。
